key.name: recaptcha_setting_desc
key.value:
To activate Google CAPTCHA follow these steps:

  • Register your domain in this page and choose reCAPTCHA v2 for reCAPTCHA Type and Invisible reCAPTCHA badge for reCAPTCHA v2 .
  • You will be given Site Key and Secret Key. Copy them to the form below and you are all set!

key.name: invalid_secret_key_notice_html
key.value:
Dear user ،
The Secret key provided for Google Invisible ReCAPTCHA is invalid. Please enter a valid secret key.

key.name: invalid_secret_key_notice_text
key.value: Dear user، The Secret key provided for Google Invisible ReCAPTCHA is invalid. Please enter a valid secret key.

key.name: invalid_secret_key_notice_subject
key.value: Invalid secret key for Google Invisible ReCAPTCHA plugin
